alert.note: Alert for Banner; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 4:42AM CDT until April 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches expected with higher amounts in the Wildcat Hills. Freezing drizzle is also possible Monday evening. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Scotts Bluff County and Banner County, including the city of Scottsbluff. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
